mixins.name: rmd-transition
mixins.description: Adds a transition timing function for the provided transition type.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The transition type that should be used. This should be one of the
    keys for `$rmd-transitions`

mixins.name: rmd-collapse
mixins.description: Creates the styles for the Collapse component within react-md

variables.name: rmd-transitions
variables.description: A Map of all the available transitions for react-md.

usedBy.name: rmd-transition
usedBy.description: Adds a transition timing function for the provided transition type.

usedBy.description: Adds a transition timing function for the provided transition type.

usedBy.name: rmd-transition
usedBy.description: Adds a transition timing function for the provided transition type.

variables.name: rmd-collapse-enter-transition-func
variables.description:
The transition easing function to apply when the collapse's content is animating
in. This should be one of the `$rmd-transitions` keys.

usedBy.name: rmd-collapse
usedBy.description: Creates the styles for the Collapse component within react-md

variables.name: rmd-collapse-leave-transition-func
variables.description:
The transition easing function to apply when the collapse's content is animating
out. This should be one of the `$rmd-transitions` keys.

usedBy.name: rmd-collapse
usedBy.description: Creates the styles for the Collapse component within react-md
